GapFillDragDrop.Title: Ambitions and dreams
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose the correct word or phrase and drag it to the gap.

Content.Question:
1. I'm planning to go round the world by motorbike.
2. Which university do you want to go to?
3. He doesn't earn a lot each year. Only Â£15,000.
4. I'd like to go abroad to study.
5. When are you going to get married?
6. Everyone should learn how to type well.
7. Would you like to appear on television?
8. We want to have four children.
9. I'd like to write a novel.
10. Why do you want to become famous?
11. In Britain a lot of people want to buy their own house or flat.
12. I'm planning to start my own business.
